com.infantium.sdk2.walker

Class WalkerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.infantium.sdk2.walker.WalkerManager

  • public class WalkerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a walker and asociates events to a connection, asociates a player and produces network events for it

    • Constructor Detail

      • WalkerManager

        public WalkerManager(Connection c,
             java.io.InputStream file)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     WalkerException
        Create a WalkerManager that loads a Content Graph file in .graphml format and starts a Walker in ROOT node. Also pass a connection object to send to infantium servers all datablock events generated while traversing nodes. Each WalkerManager generates a random datablock_uuid for event reference.
        Parameters:
        c - Connection object
        file - Content Graph file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        WalkerException

      • WalkerManager

        public WalkerManager(java.io.InputStream file)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     WalkerException
        Create a WalkerManager that loads a Content Graph file in .graphml format and starts a Walker in ROOT node. This constructor does not connect the walker to infantium servers.
        Parameters:
        file - Content Graph file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        WalkerException
